text: 1.5-6: 1 Ko 2.1-2; 12.8; 2 Ko 8.7; 2 T 1.8; VB 1.2Gu khueŋ nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav ana ndikndigi. Nza fhum Kraisan buna vhuueŋ bun nde suaŋgim, ne khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, nden ndavi vherir ki. Nde Zisas phorga kim, maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme za kha bigir nde nɨɨŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra nden kurkurigim, nde tuituigiap anan buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuav, nde vhɨra anan Ŋina Ŋaar ŋgari bigi, nde tuituigira nta kaŋgi.
